title: Mi Band 7 could come with a bigger display, AOD support, GPS, Smart Alarm, and more
content:
Xiaomi’s Mi Band lineup dominates the affordable fitness tracker space and for good reason. Since its debut in 2014, the Mi Band lineup has offered an impressive set of fitness tracking features at an insanely affordable price. And Xiaomi has added new features with each annual update. Last year’s Mi Band 6 brought several improvements

The post Mi Band 7 could come with a bigger display, AOD support, GPS, Smart Alarm, and more appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new leak about Xiaomi's upcoming Mi Band 7 reveals that it could feature a bigger display, AOD support, built-in GPS, and more!
